channel.title: What do you think?
channel.description: Well I was wondering how long would it take to get 10k flax. Estimating in trying to get in 1day... Like 1k per hour or so?

item.title: What do you think?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

If you pay attention constantly, you have spottier cape, boots of lightness, and penance gloves, I see no reason why you shouldn’t be able to do close to 1000 an hour. However, if you also do the quest, As a Last Resort…, then you can also use the pools to get unlimited run for five minutes. In those five minutes, you could easily get a good 250-400. Then, just go to catherby, take a charter back to the resort, get unlimited run and tele back. With this combination, I see no reason why you couldn’t do near 2000 an hour. You may have to invest in a few normal/super energy potions as well.

Read full topic

item.title: What do you think?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

I don’t know who would waste that much time [Although back in the day when i was addicted to runescape i wouldn’t see a problem with it]

But to get 10k flax i think it would take around 15 hours.

Tbh if bow strings are still as they used to at double the price of flax then you can also instead of picking flax you could just buy some flax and spin it, then sell the bow strings.

Read full topic

item.title: What do you think?
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

My friend averaged 667 flax an hour just by running with nothing there and walking with 28 flax back. not sure how long it would take…

10k/667=14.99

15*667= 10005

so basicly 15 straight hours of playing… if you play 3 hours a day non stop then 5 days… or 5 hours non stop in 3 days… either way you’ll have no life…

Read full topic

item.title: What do you think?
item.dc:creator: @ninja_nub ninja nub
item.description:
@ninja_nub wrote:

[quote=“pk4pk, post:8, topic:179379”][quote author=Taharok link=topic=240538.msg2040318#msg2040318 date=1202536823]

[quote author=pk4pk link=topic=240538.msg2040212#msg2040212 date=1202532908]

It is always a load faster if you have unlimited run…
[/quote]How do you get unlimited run? Lol

As a Last Resort
[/quote]What do you mean…[/quote]

It isn’t possible, he’s just saying theoretically.

If you get a macro, and say you run it 24/7… I would say about 2 days.

item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:3, topic:179379”]You cannot do it in a day. Probably like 4 days.[/quote]Is possible to do it in 1day…Wake up at 9:00 a.m. and until 1:00 p.m. you can get 4-5k, then at night 8:00 to 11:30 or 12:00 you can do the rest so probably 8-9hours I’m guessing?

item.title: What do you think?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

pk4pk:

Well I was wondering how long would it take to get 10k flax. Estimating in trying to get in 1day… Like 1k per hour or so?

If you have enough negative energies and you have unlimited run (just to begin), then I would say 10k in on Saturday. (9 hours maybe, depends if you do unlimited run more than once)
